#### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking the supply of cable sets under the following specifications:

* Item 1: Pressure Sensor Stub Cable - Part No.: 2389-146-02-02
* Item 2: Magnetic Sensor Stub Cable - Part No.: 2389-146-01-02

The successful bidder will deliver the products to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia. The products must meet the National Item Description and Coding System (NIDACS) standards.

**Documents**
[Attachments to be uploaded here]

**Contact Information**
* Email: christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: None

**Important Details**

* All bids must be submitted in Canadian dollars.
* A preference exists for Canadian goods.
* The Crown reserves the right to negotiate the terms of the procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.  end of rewritten content¶
